website_summaries.verdict: This two-piece bat is light enough for younger players but still has the pop and balance for more experienced players.
pros: Two-piece composite and alloy construction reduces sting
Certified for play in ASA, ISA, ISF, NSA, and USSSA leagues
cons: Some reports of weakness between handle and barrel, but failures are rare

customer_reviews.title: Decent alloy bat!!
customer_reviews.text: Decent alloy softball bat. Definitely doesn't have the same pop as a LXT. Daughter is on a 12u fastpitch select team and this is her cold weather game bat and artificial softball (dimpled) batting practice bat. This review is for the 31" -13 bat. I don't think there is a better alloy based fastpitch softball bat, if there is I would like to know. FYI composite bats should not be used in weather below 60F or hitting artificial pitching machine BP balls. Grip is very nice, 2 piece construction helps reduce barrel buzz. This is our second Bustos bat, the first was a 29" and she outgrew it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Actually a drop 11 not 13
customer_reviews.text: My daughter currently uses a 28inch 17oz easton I wanted to get her a bat that was little longer and thought the drop 13 might be a good idea to help with bat speed. She swung the bat and told me it felt heavy I told her it was an ounce lighter. I decided to weigh her old bat and the bustos her old easton was 17.2 oz when I weighed the bustos I was surprised to find it was 18 oz when it was advertised to be 16oz so its actually a drop 11 not 13. I will be returning the bat
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for improving youth
customer_reviews.text: Bat has great swing weight. My daughter is smaller but pretty strong. Allows her to generate great swing speed. The composit portion helps with hand vibrations that you usually get with full aluminum bats. Ball sounds good coming off the bat and reinforces positive feedback. Color scheme is unique and it’s easy to find when it’s her time up to bat. Overall we have been happy with this back after 6 games and 6 practices in. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MC36

customer_reviews.title: Added distance to my daughter's hitting
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 10 year old daughter for Christmas. We immediately noticed an improvement with the distance of her hitting during practice. It is comfortable for her to use and has given her lots of confidence for the upcoming season. Some of her teammates have enjoyed trying it out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: Home run!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bat! No more complaining about bat sting on her hands and when she actually hits the ball it has amazing pop and makes her feel cool she can hit the ball that far. The cool design makes the bat standout in the dugout which I love. We just finished our first season with this bat and are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: FLBeachmom

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this is 29”/19 oz and was out growing it but loved it dearly. Bought a “like new” 30”/20oz for $80 that came brand new still plastic sealed. Home run off her first game and 2 other nice hits. She has another Demarini but only uses her Bustos.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this bat!
customer_reviews.text: This bat is very impressive. My daughter plays for a 10U travel team. She has a 31" 21oz Xeno that she does amazing with when she's up against a slower pitcher. I found this bat by searching for 31" 18oz. I didn't want her to lose the length of her reach but I wanted her to be able to get the bat around better with the faster pitchers. She has been able to do just that! It's built her confidence and she knows she has the two options to bat with.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat for 10yr old girls fastpitch.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure coincidence, but the first girl to use this bat hit a home run with it on my team. It became known as "the home run bat" after that. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Michael E

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced bat..! My 10 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced bat ..! My 10 year old loves hitting and she has hit 8 doubles and 1 home run since the season started with here DeMarini..!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat was under the impression it was a full ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bat was under the impression it was a full composite not a half composite. My daughter likes it though
customer_reviews.author: Jerron Myers

customer_reviews.title: The bat flexes over an inch at the joint. ...
customer_reviews.text: The bat flexes over an inch at the joint. I have tried to fill out a warranty claim with no success. the bat is only 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bat for our 11yr old great hits with it and no more stinging hands :) Would highly recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Tmcpheron

customer_reviews.title: Dented after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bat for my 8 year old who plays tournament softball. After a month of using, the bat dented in multiple spots making it un-useable. Other than it denting the bat has great pop!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started hitting more solid balls since changing to this bat. Give it a try
customer_reviews.author: Natalie E.

customer_reviews.title: Solid bat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: More vibration than her composite bats, but great for swing speed for facing faster pitchers. Overall happy with it as an option in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: haliscribbler

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with this bat. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stidman

customer_reviews.title: No more sting!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, nice pop. Perfect for 9U/10U player. This is actually a two-piece bat.
customer_reviews.author: jillyyin

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat
customer_reviews.text: We've never actually been able to use it because covid19 interrupted softball, but the bat arrived in perfect condition. Its very lightweight and my daughter is happy with the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good bat, light and has good pop
customer_reviews.text: Good bat, light and has good pop. Perfect for my daughter as it gives her a big barrel to hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10u
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter, she love that she is not getting bat sting anymore
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight slugger
customer_reviews.text: Great bat. Lighter and longer from r my little girl. Slammin the ball
customer_reviews.author: shaun groendyke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves her bat im glad i picked this one thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mslacy

customer_reviews.title: Good bat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the bat it has good pop and little to no vibration. For the price it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Borges

customer_reviews.title: 7YO daughter fastpitch
customer_reviews.text: Good bat. Adds some pop, but some might be just an increase in her confidence because she has solid equipment. Daughter is 53" and 7YO and she can get the bat around pretty well. I was concerned the 29" bat would be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Phishininau

customer_reviews.title: Ball jumps off the bat, grand daughter likes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Ball jumps off the bat, grand daughter likes it very much.Bat appears to be well made, we are only 3 games into season so will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: andy cave

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This bat was alright and after like 3 weeks into practice and 1st game my bat dented
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Zermeno

customer_reviews.title: Light but powerful bat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bat. First time up to the plate with this bat my 8 year old hit it over everyone's heads and out to left field. Super light since she's only 56 lbs. She also hits with a combat shipman -10 that's 19oz and this one comes around a lot faster at only 16oz.
customer_reviews.author: eweeks9

customer_reviews.title: This bat is a GRAND SLAM
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this bat for the first time tonight and hit her very first homerun..a grand slam actually! She says she LOVES this bat and it's "pop"!!
customer_reviews.author: star123

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great bat, but seemed to take a little longer than most to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bat. My daughter plays 10u and she and her team loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect bat for a youth player
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect bat for a youth player. Very light but also long enough to cover the plate. The perfect bat for the next step after tball, whether it be coach pitch or machine pitch. Price is right too. You don't want to spend that much money on a bat at this age. Expensive bats come at a later age!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This bat broke within the first 5 months of use!! Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Happy daddy!
customer_reviews.text: Great bat at a good price! Demarini is hard to beat! My lil girl used most the season and bat still has good pop
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays for a 10u travel ball team and she absolutely loves this bat!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great value bat. Quality
customer_reviews.text: Is a excellent bat for price. Daughter rocks ball's into outfield more often. She says no vibrations in hands and is swinging full force because her hands no longer hurt due to vibrations. This bat is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Don't hit baseballs, dents to easy
customer_reviews.text: Good bat. Be careful to only hit softballs or the bat will dent easily. My daughter likes to hit regular baseball for hitting practice from machine. Bad idea. Dents way easy.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bat at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great bat! Daughter loves it! Can’t beat $79.00 for a D- composite bat!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Forbes

product_meta.title: DeMarini Bustos Fastpitch Softball Bat (-13)
product_meta.description: This is a New Bustos Signature Model BFP-17. This is a great choice as this is a powerful in the wrapper bat. It has these certifications USSSA 1.20 ( Stamp), NSA 2012, ISF 2005, ISA Approved, NSA Approved, and ASA Certified 2004. Crystal Bustos Signature Model 1-Piece Bat Construction DX1 Aluminum Alloy Barrel Fiber Reinforced Composite Handle Dolphin Barrel Design -13oz Length to Weight Ratio 2 1/4" Barrel Diameter
